statement.p: Note the graph shows one second.
What is the frequency of this wave?
What is the period of this wave?
What is the amplitude of this wave?

solution.p: The frequency is 5, because there are 5 copies of the curve from 0 to 1.
The period is 0.2, because one copy of the curve is completed by 0.2. Also period is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{5}}={0.2}.
The amplitude is 1, because the curve oscillates between -1 and 1.
